script.speaker: Narrator
script.text: ~Anaira: The countryside 1 PM~ :The countryside glowed under the midday sun, golden fields swaying in the breeze as the train prepared to stop.

script.speaker: Narrator
script.text: As he went down the station stairs, Chiheb checked up his phone:

script.speaker: Nova
script.text: Hey! I must go on an urgent work trip and I’m not sure when I’ll be back. Can you look after my house? My car’s there too. I’ll call you as soon as I can. The address is 5 Rivière de L’aubergine, Anaira. Let me know if that works for you!

script.speaker: Chiheb
script.text: No problem, I’ve got it covered. Just focus on your work.

script.speaker: Nova
script.text: Thanks, you’re a lifesaver! I’ll keep you updated as soon as I know more about my return.

script.speaker: Narrator
script.text: The house sat quietly at the edge of a quiet countryside road, a small matching garage stood to the side, its doors slightly ajar, revealing the glint of a car inside.

script.speaker: Chiheb
script.text: Aaah I finally made it, I'm so tired of the trip. Tonight I'm going to relax.

script.speaker: Narrator
script.text: ~Anaira: The countryside 1 AM ~ Nova's Living Room

script.speaker: Narrator
script.text: The distant chirp of crickets and rustling trees filled the night...

script.speaker: Narrator
script.text: A mechanical hum suddenly echoed through the house, jarring Chiheb awake.

script.speaker: Chiheb
script.text: Huh? What was that sound?

script.speaker: Chiheb
script.text: Why’s the garage door open ? Did I forget to close it? Man, I’m too tired for this...

script.speaker: Chiheb
script.text: What...? How is the car engine running? I didn’t even touch the keys...

script.speaker: Chiheb
script.text: This is so weird...I better turn it off and go back to sleep.

script.speaker: Narrator
script.text: ~Anaira: The countryside ?? AM ~ Nova's garage

script.speaker: Chiheb
script.text: Ugh ... what happened ???

script.speaker: Chiheb
script.text: What the- ?!

script.speaker: Chiheb
script.text: AAAAAAH! WHAT IS THIS ?!

script.speaker: Nebula
script.text: EEEEY! SHUT IT, WILL YOU? YOU’RE BUSTING MY EARS!

script.speaker: Chiheb
script.text: What... WHO ARE YOU?! And what’s this thing on my arm?!

script.speaker: Nebula
script.text: And you bonded with the car. Now you’re stuck with it. Tough luck

script.speaker: Chiheb
script.text: No way! Get this off me! I didn’t sign up for this! I’m not even MARRIED yet

script.speaker: Nebula
script.text: There’s a map in the system. It leads to the car’s creator. If anyone can fix this, it’s him—if he’s still alive.

script.speaker: Narrator
script.text: The holographic map showed Chiheb current position

script.speaker: Chiheb
script.text: It only shows our current position ! How’s that helpful?!

script.speaker: Nebula
script.text: That’s all I’ve got. Take it or leave it.

script.speaker: Chiheb
script.text: Fine. I’ll figure this out myself, I’ll pack up and leave right away

script.speaker: Nebula
script.text: Whoa there, speedster! You can’t take off like this.

script.speaker: Nebula
script.text: Unless you want to end up stranded in the middle of nowhere, you need to check and maintain the car before any long trip.

script.speaker: Chiheb
script.text: But-

script.speaker: Nebula
script.text: No BUTS !!

script.speaker: Chiheb
script.text: Fine. What do I need to check?

script.speaker: Narrator
script.text: ~Anaira: The countryside 4 AM ~ Nova's garage

script.speaker: Narrator
script.text: While Chiheb worked on the car...

script.speaker: Narrator
script.text: A thick fog began to form outside

script.speaker: Narrator
script.text: Small rocks and debris on the ground trembled slightly, as if something massive were moving in the distance

script.speaker: Nebula
script.text: Kid, we’ve got a problem. I’m picking up a signal—something big, something close. You need to wrap this up NOW

script.speaker: Chiheb
script.text: What are you talking about? Weren’t you the one urging me to check the car before leaving ???

script.speaker: Nebula
script.text: No time for that! Leave everything as it is. Trust me, you don’t want to stick around to find out what’s coming.

script.speaker: Narrator
script.text: Without further delay Chiheb jumped in the driver seat and slammed the car into gear

script.speaker: Narrator
script.text: In the rearview mirror...far in the distance, two glowing yellow lights pierced the darkness... hovering high in the sky like unblinking eyes. They shone with an eerie intensity, watching, waiting...

script.speaker: Narrator
script.text: Act 0- END
